fields.summary: Android: Investigate reducing the installed size of Titanium Mobile applications

status.name: Open

fields.description:
I tested this issue with our Ti Default project. When I publish for distribution its Apk size show me 7 MB+. I think this is too big for android. 

h5. Test Environment:

Mac OS X 10.8.5(64 bit)
Ti SDK 3.2.0.GA
Ti CLI 3.2.0
Node.js v0.10.23
Android 2.3.3

h5. Step to Reproduce:

# Create a Default project in Ti Classic 
# Publish for Android App Store
# Check Apk size, its showing 7MB + 


h5. Expected Result 

Apk size should be 3-4 MB max 

h5. Actual Result 

APK size 7MB + 


Thanks
fields.summary: Android: Apps Size is too big for sample project
fields.environment:
Mac OS X 10.8.5(64 bit)
Ti SDK 3.2.0.GA
Ti CLI 3.2.0
Node.js v0.10.23
Android 2.3.3

comments.body: In upgrading from SDK 3.2.0.v20130614230533 to 3.2.0.GA my APK size almost doubled, from ~9MB to ~17MB. Anyone else experiencing that? Anything I can do? No major assets added to account for the difference.
